item.description:
This is a nationwide effort - see http://www.bleedforli.... From January 28th to February 4th we urge you to go to your local blood donor center and donate blood in support of Doctor Ron Paul's candidacy for President. America currently has a critical national shortage of blood. One pint of blood can save three lives, so 10,000 of us can save 30,000 lives!

Wear Ron Paul gear when you go.
item.name: Bleed for Liberty
